footer.text1: LaslesVPN is a private virtual network that has unique features and has high security.

about.title: About Us
about.intro: LaslesVPN is committed to providing secure, fast, and reliable VPN services to users around the world. Our team is dedicated to ensuring your online privacy and security.
about.missionText: To deliver top-notch VPN services that protect our users' privacy and enable them to access content securely and freely, no matter where they are.
about.visionText: To become the most trusted and widely used VPN service in the world, known for innovation and commitment to privacy.
about.value1: Privacy First: We prioritize your privacy in everything we do.
about.value2: Innovation: We continuously improve our services with cutting-edge technology.
about.value3: Customer Satisfaction: Your satisfaction is our success.

features.title: Our Features
features.subtitle: Explore the amazing features of LaslesVPN that make your online experience secure and enjoyable.

feature1.title: Powerful Protection
feature1.description: Experience robust online protection with advanced encryption and secure protocols.

feature2.title: Global Accessibility
feature2.description: Access content from anywhere in the world with our extensive server network.

feature3.title: High-Speed Connection
feature3.description: Enjoy lightning-fast speeds with no interruptions or buffering.

feature4.title: No Logs Policy
feature4.description: We don't track your online activity, ensuring your privacy is maintained.

feature5.title: Multi-Device Support
feature5.description: Connect multiple devices simultaneously and secure your entire household.

feature6.title: User-Friendly Interface
feature6.description: Our easy-to-use interface makes managing your VPN connections simple and intuitive.

pricing.title: Choose Your Pricing Plan
pricing.subtitle: Select the plan that best suits your needs and budget.

card1.title: Basic Plan
card1.description: Ideal for individuals who need essential features.

card2.title: Standard Plan
card2.description: For small teams needing advanced features.

card3.title: Premium Plan
card3.description: For larger teams with extensive requirements.
